forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 19C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 66F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 11C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 51F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 52F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 45F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Thunder possible. High 51F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. ENE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 53F. ENE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low near 5C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 41F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 5C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 42F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 12C. ESE winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 54F. ESE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
